name: Nana Shimura [My Hero Academia] Character LoRA
description:
Nana Shimura from My Hero Academia - Character LoRA

If you like what I create, feel free to support on Ko-Fi!🍵

Make sure to leave a review if you like it, would love to see all the pictures everyone creates!

Pro Hero from My Hero Academia, Nana Shimura! Trained on the NovelAI model, and tested with many different anime specific models such as AOM3, AOM2_Hard, NovelAI, Anything v4.5, mistoonAnime, Universal Solvent Mix, Based64Mixv-V3, and a few more. This LoRA definitely can produce images of Nana Shimura in her Hero outfit very well. However, you can also feel free to generate her in other outfits, such as a tank top and shorts in one of my example images. I found that this LoRA works well with a weight of 0.9 - 1. I have generally found a weight of 1 works perfectly fine in all circumstances. Have found a CFG between 7-9 works well, along with Step around 25-30, but feel free to experiment! Also Clip Skip of 2.

  • Triggers are: NanaShimura and boku no hero academia

  • Description Tags that may help: black hair, blue eyes, hair between eyes, sleeveless, red belt, white cape, yellow gloves, whole bodysuit, yellow footwear

  • Some Negatives that may help: EasyNegative, badhandv4, extra digit, fewer digits, (extra arms:1.2), bad hands, ((badhandv4)), watermark, signature, text, patreon username, username
